structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Reciprocity for licensees of other states.

text.section:
A person seeking a license as a home inspector under this section shall:
Apply on a form prescribed and provided by the board; and
Pay the applicable licensing fee established by the board.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 9, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 8, effective July 13, 2004.
